content.question: The relief of Akhenaton, Nefertiti, and three daughters was most likely originally displayed

choices.label: in the inner sanctum of a temple, accessible only to priests
as a wall decoration in the audience hall of a palace
in a household shrine used for private worship
above the main entrance gate to a royal citadel

content.answer: in a household shrine used for private worship
